name: tcl_sqlite.vim
summary: syntax coloring for sqlite inside tcl, extends tcl.vim
description:
Adds sqlite syntax to tcl.vim (vimscript #1603)

Words that (can) conflict with Tcl
        eval -  overrides eval as a secondary command for interp. 
                   This should really not be a problem.
install_details:
Place in ~/.vim/syntax/

    Activated by uncommenting the option at the top of the tcl.vim file.
